title: Can men wear the color Maroon or Burgundy? (not red) - Assim al hakeem
transcript: from bangladesh he says if i wear a jacket there it is not pure red rather it is maroon or burgundy so if it is not read due to the difference of opinion this is permissible inshallah especially when we know that maroon or burgundy is closer to being brown rather than pure red and inshallah this is permissible
